name: Cat Rescue Simulator
description:
Hello! Thank you for checking out our Submission for the 48 hour, Area Of Effect 2021 Game Jam! 

"Welcome Comrade, you've made it to Cat Rescue Simulator, Congratulations. Here are your Objectives, Use that water hose of yours to put out the the scary fires around you, If you hear a cat meow, follow it.. You must rescue all 10 Cats in order to pass this part of your training. Good Luck, and don't forget about the timer, each of those furry creatures you rescue will give a bit of time bonus. Let the timer run out? and it's game over for you, and your furry friends."

Special Thanks for our Dev Team:
Stevyn Vieville - Sound Design, Music
Raphael - Tech GD, Code and Integration
Sergio Chiraz - Graphics Programmer, Fire Shader
Javi - 3D Artist - Modular Pieces, 3D Assets, Textures
Alex Bedrossian - 3D Artist, Level Design
Sonya Golubkova - 2D Artist - Character Design, Animation, Voice Acting
Caiden Boulton 2D Artist - HUD, Menu Design
